data.name: Sisters of Silent Liberty Online Multiplayer Shooter REBRANDED
data.detailed_description:
SISTERS OF SLIENT LIBRETY (REBRANDED) INTO A Horror MULTIPLAYER SHOOTER
(The Reviews Are from the Old Game)

The SIsters of Slient Liberty has Escaped the Asylum and Killed 4 Guards and
stolen there Guns and Has Seeked Refuge in a Grave yard Soldiers Have tracked
Them Down and Now There's Going to Be War In the Online Horror Free for all Multiplayer Shooter
Choose Your Characters Wising and Join the Battle With Your Friends You can Choose To Play
As a Solider or 1 Of the Sisters The Sisters And Choose Between 5 Weapon Classes

-Assault
-Recon
-Support
-Engineer
More Weapon Classes Will Be Added Soon

You can Choose Play As Either 1 Of the Sisters or A Soldier
the Sisters Are

Naiko- Abilty Speed
Yuka- Abilty -Accuracy
Riko- Abilty -Range

data.short_description: Game Features - 6 Player Free For All Game Mode -Play Together - Different Weapon Classes - AI With Different Style Patterns -Different Characters With Different Ability's -Dangerous Weaponry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: intel Celeron
  • Memory: 25 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Celeron
  • DirectX: Version 8.1b
  • Storage: 65 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AudioQuest DragonFly Red USB Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: This Game was Made on A Potato Trust Me It Could Play Very Good on Your Computer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: intel 13
  • Graphics: BIOSTAR GEFORCE GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 65 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster X3 External Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: This Game was Made on A Potato Trust Me It Could Play Very Good on Your Computer
